DOC.brief_summary: In study , 20 healthy individual , 20 endo-ACAB patient , 20 CABG patient undergo maximal cardiopulmonary exercise test hospital discharge ( patient ) . Exercise tolerance compare group .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Tolerance Patients With CABG Sternotomy v . Patients With Minimally Invasive Coronary Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective observational study , 20 healthy individual ( history presence chronic disease , sedentary ) , 20 endo-ACAB patient , 20 CABG patient ( match age , gender BMI ) undergo maximal cardiopulmonary exercise test hospital discharge ( patient ) .During exercise test , follow parameter assess peak effort second ventilatory threshold ( determine VE/VCO2 slope method ) : oxygen uptake ( VO2 ) , oxygen saturation ( SaO2 ) , carbon dioxide output ( VCO2 ) , resoiratory gas exchange ratio ( RER ) , expiratory volume ( VE ) , ventilatory equivalent VCO2 ( VE/VCO2 ) , ventilatory equivalent VO2 ( VE/VO2 ) , end-tidal O2 pressure ( PETO2 ) , end-tidal CO2 pressure ( PETCO2 ) , heart rate ( HR ) , oxygen pulse ( VO2/HR ) , cycle power output ( W ) , tidal volume ( Vt ) , respiratory rate ( RR ) , systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , rate pressure product ( RPP ) . Peak exercise effort validate RERpeak .
DOC.criteria: undergo type surgery . For healthy subject : must sedentary . neurologic , nephrologic , respiratory disease . For healthy subject : chronic disease condition .
